titles.title: Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009
A bill to authorize appropriations for grants to the States participating in the Emergency Management Assistance Compact, and for other purposes.
Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009
Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009
Emergency Management Assistance Compact Reauthorization Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 111-103.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 223.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the Senate on December 9, 2009. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009 - Amends the Post-Katrina Emergency Management Reform Act of 2006 to authorize appropriations for Emergency Management Assistance Compact grants for FY2010-FY2012.
